mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id userId, a.order_id orderId, c.goods_id goodsId, c.goods_name goodsName, b.goods_count goodsCount, b.the_goods_all_price theGoodsAllPrice, c.goods_price goodsPrice, c.goods_original_cost goodsShelfCost FROM t_info_order a LEFT JOIN t_info_order_deepen b ON a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.order_id = b.order_id AND a.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN t_info_goods c ON b.goods_id = c.goods_id
